name: Dilip Bukkambudhi Ganesh
title: Aspiring Software Engineer
summary: I am a graduate student in Computer Science at Virginia Commonwealth University with interests spanning software development, machine learning, data science, and blockchain. I enjoy building end-to-end AI systems, from data preprocessing and feature engineering to model training, evaluation, and deployment. My recent work includes a content-based image retrieval system in MATLAB and an AI-powered debt management application built with LangGraph and Streamlit.

details: Developed and maintained the clinic's website, improving user experience and accessibility. Collaborated with healthcare professionals to implement features that enhanced patient engagement and streamlined appointment scheduling.
Contributed to the development of web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

presentations.title: Ethical considerations in AI system
presentations.description: Authored a research paper on ethical considerations in AI systems, focusing on bias mitigation and transparency.

presentations.title: Debt-manager system
presentations.description: Developed an AI-powered debt management application using LangGraph and Streamlit, enabling users to visualize and manage their debts effectively.

presentations.title: Detection and classification of skin lesions using deeep learning
presentations.description: Research paper on deep learning‚Äìbased multi-class skin lesion classification using transfer learning (ResNet50), achieving 83.45% test accuracy and a mean AUC of 0.9689 on the HAM10000 dataset.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

presentations.title: Kernel Scheduling Techniques
presentations.description: Comparative analysis of various CPU scheduling algorithms including priority-based and round-robin approaches in modern operating systems

presentations.title: Network Simulator Tool
presentations.description: Developed a packet-level network simulator to model TCP/IP protocols and analyze network performance under different traffic conditions

presentations.title: Agile Dev Case Study
presentations.description: Case study implementing Scrum methodology for a team project, documenting sprint planning and retrospective processes

projects.name: Debt manager + AI Summarizer
projects.description: Built an AI-driven debt management tool using Python, LangGraph, and Streamlit to analyze and summarize user financial data, generate actionable insights through structured AI workflows, and present results via an interactive web interface with clear visualizations.

projects.name: Amusement park management system
projects.description: Created a comprehensive amusement park management system using React,JavaScript, Node.js, and SQLite, featuring modules for ticketing, ride scheduling, and customer relationship management to streamline park operations and enhance visitor experience.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Developed a personal finance management tool using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, allowing users to track expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending patterns through interactive charts.

projects.name: Content-Based Image Retrieval
projects.description: Developed a content-based image retrieval system using MATLAB, implementing feature extraction techniques like color histograms, texture analysis, and edge detection to enable efficient image similarity searches.
